name: M.O.O.M
description:
MOOM (Mirror Oriented Oriented Mirror) - try to survive as long as you can, using a mirror to reflect lasers. Break crates! Stack your power-ups! Be aware of vampires, they can teleport near to you and restore HP by the melee attack. Don't forget grenades, which sometimes the only good way to kill the nasty enemy.  KILL HYDRA

CONTROLS 

Use the mouse to rotate the player and reflect lasers by the mirror 

WASD - move the player around the map

Q - change the item type 

G - apply the item, or throw a grenade to the area, where the pointer is

Left Click - melee, for example, try to break crates or attack enemies
